TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_dadiw_nu_kanatal-hata, title = dadiw_nu_kanatal-hata, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/dadiw_nu_kanatal-hata} }

S.FORM: dadiw nu kanatal-hata 國旗歌 sapuelac dadiw nu kanatal-hata saan, u ayza-nisamihmihcaan kanatal nikaseneng tu kanatalay a dadiw. kayadahay a dadiw nu kanatal-hata u nikaseneng tu hata atu manamuh tu kanatalay a dadiw dada', caay padadiw saca mudadiw i mahmuwac tu kanatal-hata. cidek ku Conhuaminkuay a kanatal-hata dadiw. u sakacacay padadiw saca mudadiw i mahmuwac tu kanatal-hata a kawaw, mahiza kanatal-dadiw. namakayniyan a nasulitan nasakamuwan atu natinengan Wikipayke paybalucu'ay pulungamin a cudad-國旗歌 dadiw nu kanatal hata nu kanatal mahmuwac tu hata nasulitan nay paybalucu'ay a kawaw nu subana'ay a pu 2018-1, nasulitan ni Tuku Sayun Taywan Sakizaya putiput i Youtube-kanatal-dadiw nakulitan ni Yiyang Sayun

dadiw no kanatal-hata 國旗歌 sapoelac dadiw no kanatal-hata saan, o ayza-nisamihmihcaan kanatal nikaseneng to kanatalay a dadiw. kayadahay a dadiw no kanatal-hata o nikaseneng to hata ato manamoh to kanatalay a dadiw dada', caay padadiw saca modadiw i mahmowac to kanatal-hata. cidek ko Conhoaminkoay a kanatal-hata dadiw. o sakacacay padadiw saca modadiw i mahmowac to kanatal-hata a kawaw, mahiza kanatal-dadiw. namakayniyan a nasolitan nasakamowan ato natinengan Wikipayke paybaloco'ay polongamin a codad-國旗歌 dadiw no kanatal hata no kanatal mahmowac to hata nasolitan nay paybaloco'ay a kawaw no sobana'ay a po 2018-1, nasolitan ni Toko Sayon Taywan Sakizaya potipot i Yootobe-kanatal-dadiw nakolitan ni Yiyang Sayon
